abilBonus.description: The list of available ability bonuses for the class.

baseHP.description: The base HP of the class. Used in calculation of HP at each level

recoveryDice.description: The die that is rolled for recovery

startingGold.description: The amount of gold that the class starts with

noArmor.description: The AC configuration for a member of the class while wearing no armor

baseAC.description: The base AC value for when the character has no armor

attackPenalty.description: The attack penalty value for when the character has no armor

lightArmor.description: The AC configuration for a member of the class while wearing a light armor

baseAC.description: The base AC value for when the character has a light armor

attackPenalty.description: The attack penalty value for when the character has a light armor

heavyArmor.description: The AC configuration for a member of the class while wearing a heavy armor

baseAC.description: The base AC value for when the character has  heavy armor

attackPenalty.description: The attack penalty value for when the character has  heavy armor

shield.description: The AC configuration for a member of the class while using a shield
shield.$comment: There are only two configurations available: one with penalty and one without. A shield always grants a +1 bonus

baseAC.description: The AC value granted by use of a shield. This is always 1

attackPenalty.description: The attack penalty value for a character that is using a shield.

basicMeleeAttack.description: The attack configuration for a class's basic melee attacks

basicRangedAttack.description: The attack configuration for a class's basic ranged attacks
